content: जामित्रं The seventh zodiacal sign from the natal sign (लग्न); तिथौ च जामित्रगुणान्वितायां <ls>Ku. 7. 1.</ls> ( जामित्रं लग्नात्सप्तमं स्थानं <ls>Malli.</ls>) {%Note%}--Some derive the word from जाया, because in astrology, the जामित्र sign indicates the future good-luck of one's wife (जायामित्रं?); but the word is obviously connected with the Greek {%diametron%}.
